item.title: Flag on lamppost, 25th August
item.description:
The far-right flag campaign has put a flag on a lamppost outside the Barnardo's. West Thamesmead is one of the most diverse immigrant communities in the UK and placing this flag here is a clearly racist provocation and possible hate crime. This has no place in our community, please take this down.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thames Reach, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog foul again 25 Aug, 25th August
item.description:
Dog fouling again. I don’t understand why no action has been taken. The owner is continuously allowing their dog to foul on this estate without cleaning up, and nothing is being done about it. This cannot be allowed to carry on — it’s unacceptable.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Drysdale Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
